title: welly550
author: welly550
content: Hello i sell UK sportsbooks accounts from sites like unibet,williamhill, paddypower  and many others (im able to create them)DM me for more info

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: This is becoming common on this forum again and likely only one person may be responsible for it. If I understand your correctly, you mean that you are selling betting site accounts? The accounts that you want to sell, check the gambling sites terms of service and see if account sales is not against at, you will see how you are wrong.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: welly550 on January 10, 2023, 08:22:43 AMHello i sell UK sportsbooks accounts from sites like unibet,williamhill, paddypower  and many others (im able to create them)DM me for more infoYou are trying to sell Sportsbet accounts on the betting sites Unibet, Williamhill, and so on. I think you are not an admin of the mentioned site and also you have no access to create a database of verification documents. In this case, you are telling lie about the verification which you can do, or you will hack/steal KYC data like this post. Or you will create fake data. But all of these are part of scams.
